name: it-progress slider
author: IT-progress

sections.description:
It’s a simple slider to display posts.
For example, you can use this slider to display reviews on your site.
You can change the height of the plugin.
You can change the color and size of the text
You can change the transparency and background color
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire it-progress slider folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. To output the slider, use the shortcode [itppsc_slider], additional attributes for output you can see http://it-progress71.ru/documentation/
sections.changelog:

Added ability to customize via shortcode:
